sources.title: I CONFESS 1950 - ALFRED HITCHCOCK
sources.description: I Confess is a 1953 American film noir directed by Alfred Hitchcock, starring Montgomery Clift as Catholic priest Father Michael William Logan, Anne Baxter as Ruth Grandfort, and Karl Malden as Inspector Larrue. The film is based on a 1902 French play by Paul Anthelme titled Nos deux consciences, which Hitchcock saw in the 1930
